# ChatCompletionResponseMessage

A chat completion message generated by the model.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**content** | **string** | The contents of the message. | [default to undefined]
**refusal** | **string** | The refusal message generated by the model. | [default to undefined]
**tool_calls** | [**Array&lt;ChatCompletionMessageToolCall&gt;**](ChatCompletionMessageToolCall.md) | The tool calls generated by the model, such as function calls. | [optional] [default to undefined]
**role** | **string** | The role of the author of this message. | [default to undefined]
**function_call** | [**ChatCompletionResponseMessageFunctionCall**](ChatCompletionResponseMessageFunctionCall.md) |  | [optional] [default to undefined]
**audio** | [**ChatCompletionResponseMessageAudio**](ChatCompletionResponseMessageAudio.md) |  | [optional] [default to undefined]
